title: Delicious
description: Naturally beautiful and culinary gifted, Grace Knowles, is determined to leave her sheltered life in Ivy-upon-Wye. When Guy Rowling, a sexy striker for London Lions football team, lands on her doorstep in desperate need of a wedding cake, Grace jumps at the chance to make a name for herself. But the handsome lothario has other ideas. Guy wants to get to know Grace beyond a business transaction and he knows she's keen. He brings her to Worthington Hall to construct a wedding cake for a star-studded wedding. Unexpectedly Guy and Grace embarked on a sexually charged love affair that leaves them craving for more. Yet envious foes, Rumour Mill paparazzi, bitter family and the test of time are hell bent on keeping the couple apart and from falling in love. Can their budding relationship survive under the glittering lights, jealousy, greed and an unwanted obsession of another that leads to deadly consequences? Sometimes love and scandal are too delicious to ignore.
author: Erica Hutchings
